Key Match Events: Edwin Diaz allowed a go-ahead grand slam in the 8-5 loss to the Diamondbacks
Pete Alonso, J.D. Martinez, and Jesse Winker grounded out to end the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phillip Martinez hit a booming RBI double off the right-center field wall to score the Mets' first run
Francisco Alvarez plated Martinez with an RBI single up the middle
Harrison Bader hit a 423-foot bomb on a 90 mph cutter over the plate to tie the game
Others: Luis Severino allowed four runs on eight hits and one walk while striking out nine in 4.2 innings
Eduardo Rodriguez was perfect through four innings
Corbin Carroll's two home runs accounted for five of Arizona's eight runs
